name: Droid Mania: Tactical Roguelike
description:
Test your strategic and tactical skills in the turn-based game Droid Mania.

Features:

- Hardcore challenge in a bit chess-like game

- Completely offline

- Procedurally generated levels

- Permadeath

- A lot of unexpected and funny situations

- RPG elements: experience points and unit levels

- Optimized for one-handed play

 

The game is completely free. No forced ads.
